## Shape.IsFlippedHorizontally property

获取并设置形状是否水平翻转。

```csharp
public bool IsFlippedHorizontally { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if(shape.IsFlippedHorizontally == false)
    shape.IsFlippedHorizontally = true;
```
